question: Which organisation announced that the global trade would contract by 7 to 9 per cent in 2019?
explanation:
The UN trade and development body, UNCTAD has revealed that the export growth declined in India in the third quarter of 2020 relative to the same quarter last year.
However, in September the export growth rose by four per cent. UNCTAD also estimates that the value of global trade to contract by 7 per cent to 9 per cent with respect to 2019.
